name: Perform Login, Purchase, and Logout
description: Test Description: This test will log-in to automationpractice.com, Then add two different category products to the cart and complete the checkout process with payment. Finally, It will Sign out from the system.
descriptionHtml: Test Description: This test will log-in to automationpractice.com, Then add two different category products to the cart and complete the checkout process with payment. Finally, It will Sign out from the system.
statusMessage:

	expected [T-shirts - My Store] but found [T-shirts - My Shop],
	expected [Order - My Store] but found [Order - My Shop]

steps.name: Provide an Email & Password and click on Sign In button
Taking a screenshot for Log In Information
Taking a screenshot for After Log In -My Account Page
Scroll to Product then Hover on Product and Click on add To Cart Button Button
Click on Proceed To Checkout Button From Cart details window
Taking a screenshot for Cart Details
Review Cart Summary and click on Proceed To Checkout button
Taking a screenshot for Address Information

parameters.name: addiAddress
parameters.value: Take first left after Jr. school

steps.name: Review Address and write Additional Information then click on Proceed To Checkout button
Review Shipping details and checked Terms of service then click on Proceed To Checkout button
Scroll to Payment option and click on Pay By check
Click on confirm My Order Button to complete the checkout process

parameters.name: arg10
parameters.value: Take first left after Jr. school

parameterValues: Take first left after Jr. school
